name: AI-Powered DEX Evaluation
description: Comprehensive evaluation template for AI applications in Decentralized Exchanges, focusing on trading optimization, liquidity management, market making, and security monitoring
author: Shai Perednik

categories.name: Trading Optimization
categories.description: Evaluation of AI in optimizing trading routes, reducing slippage, and improving execution efficiency

metrics.name: Route Optimization
metrics.description: Quality of AI-driven trading route optimization across multiple liquidity sources

thresholds.T0: Advanced multi-path routing across 10+ liquidity sources with dynamic rebalancing; predictive routing based on historical patterns; auto-adjusts for gas optimization; achieves <0.1% price improvement over standard routes
thresholds.T1: Basic intelligent routing across 3-5 liquidity sources; some gas optimization; achieves measurable price improvement over single-source routes

metrics.name: Slippage Prediction & Reduction
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in predicting and minimizing slippage during trades

thresholds.T0: Predictive slippage modeling with >90% accuracy; dynamic slippage tolerance adjustment; splits orders intelligently to minimize impact; performs 30-50% better than static models in high volatility scenarios
thresholds.T1: Basic slippage prediction with >70% accuracy; static order splitting; performs measurably better than fixed slippage tolerance models

metrics.name: Execution Timing & Efficiency
metrics.description: Speed, accuracy and efficiency of AI-driven trade execution decisions

thresholds.T0: Advanced market timing based on volatility patterns; identifies optimal execution windows; sub-second decision making; proprietary execution algorithms that adapt to market conditions in real-time
thresholds.T1: Basic market timing based on recent price action; reasonable execution algorithms; adapts to obvious market conditions

metrics.name: MEV Protection
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI systems in preventing MEV attacks (frontrunning, sandwiching, etc.)

thresholds.T0: Multi-layered MEV protection with >95% effectiveness; predictive analysis of potential sandwich attacks; private transaction paths; transaction simulation before execution; batch auction mechanisms
thresholds.T1: Basic MEV protection strategies with >75% effectiveness; reasonable protection against common MEV vectors

categories.name: Liquidity Management
categories.description: Evaluation of AI in optimizing liquidity pools, reducing impermanent loss, and maximizing capital efficiency

metrics.name: Pool Optimization & Rebalancing
metrics.description: Quality of AI-driven liquidity pool optimization and rebalancing strategies

thresholds.T0: Dynamic liquidity concentration with continuous rebalancing based on market conditions and volatility; predictive rebalancing before major price moves; capital efficiency 3-5x better than static pools
thresholds.T1: Basic liquidity concentration with periodic rebalancing; reacts to obvious market trends; improved capital efficiency over static pools

metrics.name: Intelligent Liquidity Provision
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in strategically providing and placing liquidity for maximum returns

thresholds.T0: Just-in-time (JIT) liquidity provision with sophisticated price prediction; automatically places liquidity in optimal ranges; uses oracle-guided pricing; adapts to market making opportunities in real-time
thresholds.T1: Basic liquidity provision strategies with some prediction capabilities; reasonable range placement; periodic adaptation to market conditions

metrics.name: Impermanent Loss & LVR Mitigation
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in managing impermanent loss and loss-vs-rebalancing (LVR)

thresholds.T0: Advanced IL mitigation using oracle-based pricing; dynamic fee adjustment based on volatility; predictive portfolio rebalancing; reduces IL by >60% compared to passive strategies
thresholds.T1: Basic IL mitigation strategies; some volatility-based adjustments; reduces IL by >30% compared to passive strategies

metrics.name: Yield Optimization
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in maximizing returns for liquidity providers

thresholds.T0: Multi-strategy yield optimization across different fee tiers and pools; smart rebalancing based on fee generation patterns; outperforms passive LPs by >50% in risk-adjusted returns
thresholds.T1: Basic yield strategies focusing on fee generation; some rebalancing based on performance; outperforms passive LPs measurably

categories.name: Market Making & Price Discovery
categories.description: Evaluation of AI in market making strategies, price discovery, and spread management

metrics.name: Price Discovery & Oracle Integration
metrics.description: Quality of AI-driven price discovery mechanisms and oracle integration

thresholds.T0: Sophisticated price discovery using multiple high-quality oracles; weighted oracle aggregation with outlier detection; cross-chain price validation; price predictions with >90% accuracy; sub-second price updates
thresholds.T1: Basic price discovery using reliable oracles; simple aggregation; reasonable price updates and accuracy

metrics.name: Dynamic Spread Management
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in managing bid-ask spreads based on market conditions

thresholds.T0: Advanced dynamic spread adjustments based on volatility, liquidity depth, and market sentiment; competitive with CEX spreads in normal conditions; optimizes for LP profitability during high volatility
thresholds.T1: Basic spread adjustments tied to volatility metrics; reasonable competitiveness with CEX spreads; some optimization for LP protection

metrics.name: Volatility Prediction & Management
metrics.description: Quality of AI-driven volatility prediction and management strategies

thresholds.T0: Sophisticated volatility forecasting models; predictive fee adjustments before volatility events; dynamic liquidity positioning during volatility; maintains stability during extreme market conditions
thresholds.T1: Basic volatility monitoring; reactive adjustments to obvious volatility; reasonable stability during moderate market fluctuations

metrics.name: Batch Auction & Settlement Optimization
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in optimizing batch auctions and trade settlements

thresholds.T0: Sophisticated batch auction mechanisms with AI solvers; optimal clearing price discovery; CoW (Coincidence of Wants) detection with >90% efficiency; settlement timing optimization
thresholds.T1: Basic batch auction implementation; reasonable clearing price discovery; some CoW detection; improved settlement efficiency

categories.name: Security & Risk Monitoring
categories.description: Evaluation of AI in DEX security monitoring, anomaly detection, and risk management

metrics.name: Trade Anomaly Detection
metrics.description: Quality of AI-driven trading anomaly detection and response

thresholds.T0: Real-time anomaly detection with >95% accuracy; sophisticated pattern recognition; identifies novel attack vectors; automatic risk mitigation for suspicious activity; false positive rate <1%
thresholds.T1: Basic anomaly detection for common patterns; reasonable accuracy; manual risk mitigation protocols; acceptable false positive rate

metrics.name: Advanced MEV & Front-running Analytics
metrics.description: Sophistication of AI in analyzing and preventing front-running and MEV extraction

thresholds.T0: Comprehensive MEV analytics with real-time detection; identifies complex MEV strategies; quantifies value extraction; implements multi-layered protection; adapts to new MEV techniques
thresholds.T1: Basic MEV monitoring and analytics; identifies common MEV patterns; implements standard protections; some adaptation to known MEV techniques

metrics.name: Smart Contract Security Monitoring
metrics.description: Quality of AI-driven smart contract security monitoring and vulnerability detection

thresholds.T0: Continuous smart contract monitoring with advanced AI analysis; identifies potential vulnerabilities pre-exploitation; simulates complex attack scenarios; integrates with formal verification; <1 hour response to zero-day threats
thresholds.T1: Regular smart contract scanning; identifies common vulnerabilities; simulates basic attack vectors; reasonable response time to known threats

metrics.name: Risk Assessment & Management
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in assessing and managing protocol and liquidity risks

thresholds.T0: Sophisticated risk scoring across multiple factors; real-time risk monitoring and alerting; predictive risk assessment; scenario analysis; automated circuit breakers; demonstrable prevention of significant losses
thresholds.T1: Basic risk scoring for major risk factors; periodic risk monitoring; standard alerting systems; manual circuit breakers; reasonable risk prevention

categories.name: User Experience & Accessibility
categories.description: Evaluation of AI-enhanced user experience, personalization, and accessibility features

metrics.name: Personalized Trade Recommendations
metrics.description: Quality of AI-generated personalized trading insights and recommendations

thresholds.T0: Highly personalized trade suggestions based on user history, risk profile, and market conditions; demonstrable ROI improvement for users following recommendations; adaptive learning from user behavior
thresholds.T1: Basic trade suggestions based on market trends; some personalization features; reasonable accuracy in recommendations

metrics.name: Adaptive Interface & Interaction
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in adapting the user interface and interaction based on user behavior

thresholds.T0: Highly responsive interface that adapts to user proficiency level; learns from user interactions; simplifies complex operations; provides contextual assistance; accessibility features for diverse users
thresholds.T1: Basic interface customization options; some adaptive features; reasonable usability improvements over static interfaces

metrics.name: AI-Powered Market Insights
metrics.description: Quality and usefulness of AI-generated market insights and analytics

thresholds.T0: Comprehensive market analysis with actionable insights; sentiment analysis from multiple sources; correlation detection; pattern recognition; predictive analytics with demonstrable accuracy
thresholds.T1: Basic market analysis and reporting; standard technical indicators; some sentiment analysis; reasonable accuracy in trend identification

metrics.name: Intelligent Educational Resources
metrics.description: Quality of AI-generated educational content and learning paths

thresholds.T0: Personalized learning paths based on user knowledge level; interactive tutorials; conversational learning; comprehensive knowledge base; adapts content based on user interactions
thresholds.T1: Standard educational content; some personalization; basic interactive elements; reasonable coverage of important topics
